1.title: Hoog Bezoek
1.plot: Sleepy Frisian (ficticious) small town Lenten expects a royal visit, but the secret preparations soon talk round like anything there. Handsome, cocky farm hand Gerben Zonderland convinces himself the king is coming to personally decorate the local hero with the highest Dutch order, but the lady mayor meanly helps the rascal twins Hielke and Sietse treat him instead to a porcine surprise. Nosy mystery stranger Albert Verschuere embarks on their river boat, but his spying is sabotaged by an 'accidental' move landing him in the water. Commissioner Zwart reluctantly ...

2.title: Stelerij
2.plot: The twins trust in the innocence of Syrian refugee Tekeste, who is arrested as theft suspect and risks expulsion with his kids Issac and Aranchi, which the Klinkhamers take in for now. Villagers are mobilized to prove his innocence before the may be expelled. The knaves' prank presenting a piglet to Gerben as a royal reward, with mayoral complicity, twists as he can't sell it to the butcher but turns it into a pet. Mister Verschuere is mysteriously obsessed by the Woudagemaal and reacts freaky when he learns the water work was damaged, not properly sbaotaged.

3.title: Levensgevaarlijk Geteisem
3.plot: Ministry official Hardebol finds Gerben Zonderland lacking of any official qualification, hence forbids him to run or even mind a farm, so Gerben and young helper Kees must come up with an informal trade-off. The town assembly brainstorms about the impending royal visit in honor of the Wouda water mill's centennial. Camping keeper Steef den Ouden incites the locals to remove the (thieving' Syrians first. Albert Verschuere's accomplice's copper theft didn't stop it functioning, which only sent constable Swart searching for the thieves, so Albert wants a more effective ...

12.title: Dynamiet
12.plot: The excited villagers gather for the first-ever visit of the King, who will open the photo exhibition after the musical, where farm boy Kees stars as tap dancer. Despite the mayor pressing constable Zwart to get on with the expo, he and the twins must concentrate on clues concerning the bombs hidden by Albert Verschuere in the centennial water works Woudagemaal where the exhibition is exposed. He and his cahoots have a detonation plan B from his yacht, so the only way to stop him is keeping that out of range with the Kameleon.

imdb.plot outline: The King of the Netherlands decides to visit Lenten, because of the 100th anniversary of the 'Woudagemaal', the world's biggest active steam pumping station. Meanwhile, business photographer Verschuere visits the hotel of Klinkhamer. He's very obsessed with the steam pumping station and leaves mysterious suitcases behind, which arouses suspicion at Hielke and Sietse, who are busy with the racist camping owner Steef den Ouden. He holds a hate against the refugee Mr. Tekeste, his daughter Aranchi and son Issac and tries to accuse them of criminal activities by any means possible. The twin brothers decide to give the family shelter during the procedure for their residence status. When bombs are being discovered in the suitcases, the fate of the whole province suddenly lies in the hands of two farmer boys and the fastest boat that ever sailed the seas, the Kameleon.
imdb.title: Kameleon de serie
plot: Holland's most famous twin helps a poor family of refugees and also have to deal with a strange newcomer who seems a little too interested in the village's steam pumping station while the inhabitants are preparing for a royal visit.::Arjen Rooseboom

The King of the Netherlands decides to visit Lenten, because of the 100th anniversary of the 'Woudagemaal', the world's biggest active steam pumping station. Meanwhile, business photographer Verschuere visits the hotel of Klinkhamer. He's very obsessed with the steam pumping station and leaves mysterious suitcases behind, which arouses suspicion at Hielke and Sietse, who are busy with the racist camping owner Steef den Ouden. He holds a hate against the refugee Mr. Tekeste, his daughter Aranchi and son Issac and tries to accuse them of criminal activities by any means possible. The twin brothers decide to give the family shelter during the procedure for their residence status. When bombs are being discovered in the suitcases, the fate of the whole province suddenly lies in the hands of two farmer boys and the fastest boat that ever sailed the seas, the Kameleon.::Arjen Rooseboom
